Scene

Scene1. [19:50–21:07] N:Nigel A:Andrea

N:Hmm, corn chowder, that’s an interesting choice, you do know that cellulite is one of the main ingredients in corn chowder.

A:So none of the girls here eat anything?

N:Not since 2 became the new 4, and 0 became the new 2.

A:Well, I’m a 6.

N:Which is the new 14.

A:Oh, shoot.

N:Oh, never mind. I’m sure you have plenty more polyblend were that came from.

A:Okay, you think my clothes are hideous, I get it. But, you know, I’m not going to be in fashion forever, so I didn’t see the point of changing everything about myself, just because I have this job.

N:Yes, that’s true. That’s really what this multi billion –dollar industry is all about anyway, isn't it, inner beauty. (Nigel’s mobile rings)

N:Hello, right, come on, Miranda’s pushed the run-through up a half an hour.

A:Mum.

N:She’s always 15 minutes early, which means you’re already late, come.

A:Shoot

Scene2. [76:17–78:21] N:Nate A:Andrea

N:You are going to Paris?

A:Uh, yeah, it just happened.

N:I thought Paris was a big deal for Emily or –

A:Great, now you’re gonna give me a hard time too?

N:Andy, what the hell is wrong with you?

A:I, I didn’t have a choice, Okay? Miranda asked me, and I couldn't say no.

N:I know, that’s your answer for everything lately, I didn’t have a choice. Like this job was forced on you.

A:Nate, I get it, Okay?

N:Like you didn’t make these decisions yourself.

A:You’re mad because I work late all the time and because I missed your birthday party, and I’m sorry.

N:Oh, come on, what I am, four?

A:You hate RunWay and Miranda, and you think fashion is stupid. You’ve made that clear.

N:Andy, I make port wine reductions all day, i’m not exactly in the peace crops, you know, I wouldn’t care if you were out have pole dancing all night… as long as you did it with a whole integrity. You used to say this was just a job, you used to make fun of the Runway girls, what happened now? you’re become one of them,

A:That’s absurd

N:That’s Okay, that’s fine, just own up to it, and then we can stop pretending like we have anything in common anymore.

A:You don’t mean that, do you?

N:No, I do.

A:Maybe this trip is coming at a good time, maybe we should take a break. Nate, (A’s mobile rings) I’m sorry, just one second?

N:You know, in case you were wondering  the person whose calls you always take, that’s the relationship you’re in, I hope you two are very happy together.

A:Hello, Miranda

Scene3. [98:17 – 100:07] M:Miranda A:Andrea

M:But I was very, very impressed… by now intently you tried ti warn me, I never thought I would say this, Andrea, but I really, I see a great deal of myself in you, you can see beyond what people want, and what they need, and you cans chose for yourself.

A:I don’t think I’m like that, I – I couldn’t do what you did to Nigel, Miranda, I couldn’t do anything like that.

M:Uh, you already did. To Emily.

A:That’s not what I – No, that was – that was different, I didn’t have a choice.

M:Oh, no, you chose, you chose to get ahead, you want this life, those choice are necessary.

N:But what if this is not what I want, I mean, what if I don’t wanna live the way that you live?

M:don’t be ridiculous, Andrea, everybody wants this, everybody wants to be us.

N:Don't thank. You don't thank for this. This is sad. Very sad, only.

Mafia Party Game(MPG)(天黑请闭眼）

Working language: English

Have you ever play Mafia Games in English, or do you want to learn English about Mafia including Judge, Killer, Policemen, Civilian etc, and how funny to play one of roles in English environment? This is really good way to practice your oral English in complex context. Are your read? OK, welcome to join us and let’s do it.

Membership Criteria

  1. Positive attitude,good behavior,self-motivated, self-starter,quicker-learner;    merits: industry, persistence,open-minded,down-to-earth; No trouble-maker
  2. Passing CET4 at least or equivalent level,good listening skills(detail-oriented)
  3. Understandings team work,willing to help other members if necessary
  4. Join group-play at least two times per month
  5. Above 18 years old

Good performance

  1. Some player now are able to dig more imformation from words like must, may,etc used by others.
  2. More fluently , stutter no more
  3. More focused
Areas to improve
  1. vocabulary, still too limited.Nevertheless, it takes time to build up a sound spoken vocabulary.
  2. pronunciation,not standard, not clear, no volume adjurstment according to dynamic circumstances
  3. usage of word.For example: indentity VS indentification.
  4. Not listening to others' statement carefully;Listening skill.
  5. notes-taking: none.

content:
At the 83rd Academy Awards, The King's Speech won the Academy Award for Best Picture, Best Director (Hooper), Best Actor (Firth), and Best Original Screenplay (Seidler). The film had received 12 Oscar nominations, more than any other film.

As the actor of the year in the film of the year, I can't think of enough adjectives to praise Firth properly. The King's Speech has left me speechless. —Rex Reed, New York Observer 

Not a great deal was written about His Majesty's speech therapist, Lionel Logue, certainly not in the official biographies. Nor was much published about the Royal stutter; it appeared to be a source of profound embarrassment.— David Seidler

Fearing Public Speaking

Nowadays, public speaking has become more and more important in various occasions. And it is a vital skill for people who want to a leader or achieve something meaningful to reach self-actualization layer defined by Abraham Maslow. In business field, for example, whether we are self-employed or work at multinationals, we must speak in public for tasks accomplished now and then. However, giving a public speaking could be a scary thing for many people. It is a common source of nervousness for most of us. Some people would like to avoid this stress entirely, but this is hard to do. In the movie, King’s Speech, Albert, Duke of York was suffering from the same fear although his stutter could be better when he talked to his daughter at home.

So what would you think about the public speaking fear? Have you heard of similar interesting story about public speaking nervousness? Would you like to share your embarrassing experience regarding it with us?

Conquer the Public Speaking Fear

In the movie, healing  the King’s stutter was the key for him to speak in public well. And fortunately, his wife found a right therapist who didn’t have a transitional professional   qualification but his knowledge and first-hand experience was at leading-edge. This story inspires us with a logical thought that there must be some good approaches to conquer the public speak fear. Actually, many studies have shown us a variety of sound and practical strategies to overcome the fear, which may combine technical aspect such as breath-control, practice, preparation and so on with psychosocial aspect like confidence, attitude, etc.

What strategies have you known about conquer the public speaking fear in technical perspective or in psychological perspective? Do you know any famous story about conquering public speaking fear? Would you like to share your personal successful experience in speaking in public? What do you think about your strategies to improve your public speech skills in the near future? 

Agenda

  • Self-introduction
  • Appreciate a certain movie clip
  • Discussion in group
  • Make a concluding statement

content:
1. In the movie, Bertie and Lionel developed a close friendship gradually during the treatment or therapy, and Lionel finally became a friend of the Royal family.  We can see how trust is important to help Bertie overcome his stammering problem and then deliver the historical public speech as king successfully. “As we go down life's lonesome highway, seems the hardest thing to do is to find a friend. When you feel you've lost your way,you've got someone there to say I'll show you”

Could you describe how Bertie and Lionel set up their friendship gradually? What do you think about the significances of friendship? Tell us your story of friendship? How to set up and maintain a good friendship?

2. Duke of York was a lucky King because his wonderful wife, Duchess of York, understood and loved him deeply with a great commitment to help her husband conquer the problem. Meanwhile, she was open-minded and managed to find new treatment for Bertie. Thanks to her effort,Bertie stepped into Logue’s consultation room and the interesting and excellent fight against his stutter started and eventually succeeded.

We dream of a beautiful relationship with view to result in a marriage and a happy family.  When we face the up and downs in life, love ones share happiness and sadness together. With their Love, understanding,caring and support, we can overcome some problems in life like Bertie did.

 Could you please shareyour understanding of importance about love, relationship and family?  How to develop a relationship with someone special for you and set up your own family later on? When you are looking for your life partner, do you have dating criteria? What are your criteria?

 3. According to Wikipedia,“Personality is the particular combination of emotional, attitudinal, and behavioral response patterns of an individual.” So Personality is about“individual difference in characteristic patterns of thinking, feeling and behaving.” Generally, this“individual difference” has some impact on every aspect of life. When people consider a relationship leading to marriage, probably they weigh personality at some level.

 There is a well-known saying, “personality affects fate,” do you agree that personality influences relationship and marriage? Why or why not? If you care about personality-match for relationship and marriage, what assumptions or suggestions do you have?

2.Watch "The King's Speech"closely and you'll realize that the real villain of the Oscar-winning film isn't King George VI's debilitating stammer. It's his older brother, David.

Feckless and hedonistic, David ascends the British throne in 1936 as Edward VIII but abandons it to his unprepared brother before the year is out. His famous declaration that he was abdicating to be with "the woman I love," the American divorcee Wallis Simpson, has been raved by many people.

Talk about The story of Britain's King Edward VIII (爱德华为了和辛普森结婚而放弃王位的故事）。

It seems that this story inspires people to regard true love as first priority when we get married. what do you think about true love? ?(what is it ? How to find it ? ) In reality, people often consider about some material things such as housing, income , etc, when they plan marriage. What are your criteria for selecting a marriage partner? Can you explain why yours are ? Tips: love, wealth, beauty, rank, character,compatibility, religion,hometown, parents' acceptance, etc.

　　生活到底有多重？假设你背着一个背包，感受勒在你肩上的背带，感受到了么？我要你把生活中的一切都装入这个背包，从最小的物件开始，书架上的，抽屉里的，零食，一切乱七八糟的东西，感受重量不断增加。现在开始往里面装大点的物件，衣服，桌上的东西，台灯，毛巾枕头，电视机。现在它应该不小了，再往里面放更大的东西，你的沙发，床，餐桌，汽车，你的家，把他们统统装进去，现在，试着走走，是不是很沉重？这就是我们每天做的事情，我们不断的给自己增重直到寸步难行，我们绝不容许一个失误。现在我决定把你的背包烧了，你决定从里面拿出什么？照片？照片是给那些记不住事儿的人准备的，告诉你们，把所有的东西都烧了吧，想象一下，明天早上起来，孑然一身，轻装上阵吧！
　　今晚大多数人都将回到自己的温暖的小家，迎接家里闹腾的小狗，吵闹的孩童，他们的伴侣会关切的打听白天发生的事情，晚上，他们在夜幕中安然入睡...
　　星星从白天隐藏的角落 慢慢的爬升出来，而那些天边的微光中会有一个更为明亮的 它就是我的机翼划过的痕迹 ，祝福着其他人，悄然拂过...
　　每个人都需要一个副驾驶


影评：
Great cinematography, good pacing. Up in the Air starring George Clooney, Vera Farmiga and Anna Kendrick and co-written and directed by Jason Reitman, is a sensitive, often delightful, layered, love story. Up in the Air is without a doubt one of the year’s very best movies which deserves most of the Oscar-love and it will surely get.

Ryan Bingham (George Clooney), a corporate downsizing expert, he fires people for a living, has his life just how he loves it: no emotional ties, no relationships commitment, plenty of in-flight perks and passion for work.

He spends 320 days a year on the road, lives in neither there nor here, but he genuinely loves being on the move, home and away.

He is handsome, sophisticated, neat and tidy, always immaculately dressed, no wrinkles. As far as women go by, he always can charm into one-night stands where there are plenty of ladies on the road.

However, after he meets Alex (Vera Farmiga), a beautiful traveler who shares the same attitude about the funs of business travel, Ryan finds himself actually thinking that he might want more than just casual sex, for the first time ever Ryan thinks he have found someone worth making a commitment to.

I actually like the messages the movie presented itself. As the movie points out, we all live in the isolated prisons we build for ourselves whatever we realize the walls around us or not.

Up in the Air is the best movie I've seen all around the year. I really do enjoy the movie from the beginning to the end. It was well written, well acted, well performed and well directed. Go and see Up in the Air. It's the best movie out there.

In all, if we have lost ourselves in the pursuit of happiness, don’t be depressed, there is till hope.

Weigh the costs of the things in the backpack you carry along with you. Sometimes it’s better to travel light.

Moving is living, but life is better with company

content: 莱拉（凯丽•拉塞尔 Keri Russell 饰），一个出色的大提琴手；路易斯（乔纳森•莱斯•梅耶斯 Jonathan Rhys Meyers 饰），一名流浪的爱尔兰歌手。一个月色迷离的晚上，两人相遇了。度过难忘的一晚后，莱拉那专横的父亲又强逼她继续踏上音乐会的旅程。路易斯因等不到恋人失望之下离开了；而莱拉发觉爱人走后，独自伤心的等待肚中的孩子出生。岂料几个月后莱拉遭遇了一场车祸，宝宝亦随之夭折。孰料，莱拉的宝宝其实并没有死，而是被她狠心的父亲送到了孤儿院。一晃眼10多年过去了，生活在孤儿院的少年奥古斯特（弗莱迪•海默 Freddie Highmore 饰）坚信自己的父母还在世上，于是踏上了漫漫寻亲路。

content:
伊万（艾什顿·库奇 Ashton Kutcher 饰）曾经有一个糟糕的童年，因为他行为闯下了大祸，令他童年充满不堪回忆的往事。而事实上，他确实只是依稀记得一点可怕的情景，这些情景一直纠缠着他的正常生活。伊万接受心理学家建议，把琐碎生活记在记事本里，却偶然发现通过记事本回到过去。

这时他才清楚记起，童年时候的自己做了那么多的错事。他幻想着用现在的意识，潜入童年的身体，去弥补种种过失给人们带来的伤害，尤其是希望与当年暗恋的凯西最终走回一起。然而他一次次的跨越时空的更改，只能越来越招致现实世界的不可救药。一切就像蝴蝶效应般，牵一发而动全身。

如果你觉得与人沟通非常重要，如果你觉得好的思想可以启迪人生，如果你喜欢看电影，看美剧，看TED演讲，看国外名校公开课，如果你觉得你的生活需要良好的英文沟通能力，如果你拥有积极的生活态度喜欢结交新朋友，如果你愿意分享你的快乐与人生感悟……来吧！加入我们的活动，在这里你可以得到这些。

活动人群

具有一定的英文基础与基本词汇量，想要提高口语与听力，及英语沟通能力的朋友；需要保持英文口语表达能力的朋友；

活动目的

  • 一同观看电影或者美剧，模仿其中的情节，锻炼如何处理情感、语调、压力、速度及肢体语言等，提高英文环境中的语言的运用能力。
  • 一同观看TED演讲，公开课，纪录片，学习其中的人生哲理，分享自己的观点与对生活理解与感悟，提高使用英文对复杂事物的表达能力。
  • 参与一个快乐而有意义的社交活动，认识更多志同道合的朋友，提高自己的沟通与社交能力。
  • 当主持人，参与活动的组织与主题策划，提高自己的领导力与公众演讲能力。

活动形式

  • 自我介绍：个人的基本信息，分享一部你最喜欢的影视作品给大家。
  • 影视欣赏：一同观看20-30分钟的视频片段
  • 互动与交流：分组讨论，话题辩论，即兴表演或者影片片段表演等
  • 活动总结：参与者意见反馈，招募下期活动主持人（每次活动的主持人，也是来参加活动的朋友）

content:
原声经典电影欣赏与表演

如果你想提高英文的实际运用能力，如果你喜欢看原声电影，如果拥有积极的生活态度喜欢结交新朋友，如果你愿意分享你的快乐与人生感悟……来吧！加入我们的活动，这是您最好的选择!

目标

  • 通过学习剧本与模仿电影情节，锻炼如何处理情感、语调、压力、速度及肢体语言等，来提高英文的实际运用能力。
  • 通过模仿电影中真实生活情境与语境来培养英语思维方式。
  • 以影会友，分享你对电影对生活的理解与感悟。
  • 享受一个快乐而有意义的社交活动，认识更多志同道合的朋友。

内容

每一期我们会选择一部经典的电影作为主题，欣赏其中精彩片段，然后围绕这部电影以及片中精彩的片段进行讨论；之后一同学习片段中的对白，让大家真正理解这些对话后的情与境；最后会邀请有兴趣的朋友通过自己的方式来重新演绎这个片段，我们会把这个过程用拍摄下来，留住精彩瞬间。总之，这是一个以电影基础，欣赏，交流，学习，表演的活动，希望有兴趣的朋友积极参加，发现其中的乐趣。

每一期的电影会提前2个星期在网上公布，附上电影连接，剧本下载地址，希望参与的朋友在活动之前看完电影，如果想要尝试表演，请事先尽量背过台词。

对于第一次参加的朋友，需要进行自我介绍并分享一部你最喜欢的电影给大家。

Original Movie Appreciation and Performance

If you want to improve your English pragmatic ability, if you like watching original movie, if you wish to make new friend with positive attitude to life, if you be willing to sharing your happiness, come on, join us, our activity is your best choice!

Objectives

  • To improve our oral English skills by properly handling the stress,intonation, pace, emotion, and body language, which are considered to be some weaknesses of Chinese learners.
  • To cultivate our English thinking pattern by imitating movie or TV drama, as movies and TV drama represent authentic life situations and language spoken context of a native English speaker life.
  • To advance your English expressing skills and speech ability bysharing your understanding and imitating experience about movie and life.
  • To enjoy the joyful and meaningful social life and know more like-minded friends.

Procedure

Each activity focuses on only one classic movie. Firstly, play selected clip; secondly discuss some questions about this movie and clips; thirdly, study dialogue together to make everyone really understand the context and affection of the clips; lastly, invite some friendsto perform this scene in their way. In a word, this activity includes movie appreciation, sharing, study and performance. We hope you could find your fun in it.

The selected movies/TVs and relevant materials such as scripts, introduction and detailed information will be posted on website one week before. We hope the participation could finish the movie before coming, if you want to try to perform, please read the dialogue by heart.

A brief introduction is necessary fornewbie, such as your name, your job, your hometown etc. And don’t forget to share one of your favorite movies with us.

content:
Who Are We?

A1 Toastmasters Club is one of the more than 200 Toastmasters Clubs in China. Our members include experienced entrepreneurs, managers, doctors, lawyers, but also new graduates and students all working to enhance their skills at communication (in English) and leadership.

What Do We Do?

Our Club Members prepare and present projects from the Basic and Advanced Communication manuals developed by Toastmasters International. Each project is aimed at developing one or more specific skills needed when speaking in front of a group - of any size.

How Do We Do It?

We engage in a wide variety of activities including, but not limited to:

Speeches (prepared speeches) & speech evaluation
Table Topics (impromptu speech exercises)
Speech marathons
Area, Division & District contests and activities
Educational sessions, workshops, training sessions, guest speakers at all levels
title: 英文演讲俱乐部TMC A1 Club
brief: A fun, friendly and fascinating place to enhance your communication and leadership skills

content: Big Fish is a 2003 American fantasy adventure film based on the 1998 novel of the same name by Daniel Wallace. The film was directed by Tim Burton and stars Ewan McGregor, Albert Finney, Billy Crudup, Jessica Lange, and Marion Cotillard. Other roles are performed by Helena Bonham Carter, Matthew McGrory, and Danny DeVito among others. Finney plays Edward Bloom, a former traveling salesman from the Southern United States with a gift for storytelling, now confined to his deathbed. Bloom's estranged son, a journalist played by Crudup, attempts to mend their relationship as his dying father relates tall tales of his eventful life as a young adult, played by Ewan McGregor.

每一期我们会选择一部经典的电影作为主题，欣赏其中精彩片段，然后围绕这部电影以及片中精彩的片段进行讨论；之后一同学习片段中的对白，让大家真正理解这些对话后的情与境；最后会邀请有兴趣的朋友通过自己的方式来重新演绎这个片段，我们会把这个过程用拍摄下来，留住精彩瞬间。总之，这是一个以电影基础，欣赏，交流，学习，表演的活动，希望有兴趣的朋友积极参加，发现其中的乐趣。

对于第一次参加的朋友，需要进行自我介绍并分享一部你最喜欢的电影给大家。

Original Movie Appreciation and Performance

If you want to improve your English pragmatic ability, if you like watching original movie, if you wish to make new friend with positive attitude to life, if you be willing to sharing your happiness, come on, join us, our activity is your best choice!

Objectives

  • To improve our oral English skills by properly handling the stress,intonation, pace, emotion, and body language, which are considered to be some weaknesses of Chinese learners.
  • To cultivate our English thinking pattern by imitating movie or TV drama, as movies and TV drama represent authentic life situations and language spoken context of a native English speaker life.
  • To advance your English expressing skills and speech ability bysharing your understanding and imitating experience about movie and life.
  • To enjoy the joyful and meaningful social life and know more like-minded friends.

Procedure

Each activity focuses on only one classic movie. Firstly, play selected clip; secondly discuss some questions about this movie and clips; thirdly, study dialogue together to make everyone really understand the context and affection of the clips; lastly, invite some friendsto perform this scene in their way. In a word, this activity includes movie appreciation, sharing, study and performance. We hope you could find your fun in it.

The selected movies/TVs and relevant materials such as scripts, introduction and detailed information will be posted on website one week before. We hope the participation could finish the movie before coming, if you want to try to perform, please read the dialogue by heart.

content:
律师风云迈入第四季，继续讲述一群精英律师在工作中生活中的精彩故事。他们睿智果敢技艺超群，情感生活也丰富多彩。此剧节奏紧凑、笑料不断，涉及尖锐的社会道德问题，通过角色不断对法律的定义进行讨谈。 　　

Alan Shore和Denny Crane是著名的Crane Poole & Schmidt律师团队中少有的忘年交。公司合伙人Shirley Schmidt将在第四季继续整顿办公室内混乱的行政问题。她以机警的目光，照看事务所的一切，尤其是Denny Crane。此集由一起康科德(美国马萨诸塞州东部一镇)向州法庭申请脱离美国实现“独立”这一诉讼请求开展剧情，历来争取民主反抗强权的Alan Shore 自然不会放过这个绝好的痛斥美国不公现象的机会，而他的忘年交也是曾经的精神导师Denny Crane这下可不干了，思想保守典型美国牛仔的他坚定地站在了美国政府一边，一边是双方各自的信仰和理念，一边是多年的友谊，双方是在工作和友情中权衡利弊实现双赢呢，还是就有取舍，难免裂痕呢？看看他们是如何成熟和理性的解决这个问题。剧中因此案件涉及到了美国独立历史，建国之初的国父初衷和现今的种种人权民主的侵犯和践踏，从美国人自己嘴里说出来真是别有一番滋味，听听他们的攻辨双方如何应对，最后如何富有激情的结案陈词，而此时更像是一种演讲，听起来让人回味无穷。
因为此剧涉及到法律方面的词汇比较多，建议参加活动者提前多看。
但我想享受电影了解他们的文化才是最终的目的。此集中亦有好听的插曲，值得收藏。

And the brain/hand/mouth, which is mainly used by normal worker in their daily life, also contribute a lot in sex. So, in general, people all sell their labor for life, no real difference!” If you don't agree, Sharpe your words to join our activity to show your unique point of view. Maybe we disapprove of what you say, but we will defend to the death your right to say it~~

Looking back

  4. Did you make any resolutions last year? Did they come true?

Looking ahead

  1. What are your new year’s resolutions? You can write them  down.(For example: Eat Healthy Food/Get a Better Education/Get a Better Job/Lose Weight/Save Money/Take a Trip/Volunteer to Help Others and anything that you can think of). 
  2. How are you going to achieve them?

How I Met Your Mother has been a critical success, and hasreceived consistently strong ratings throughout its run. It has wonfive Emmy Awards, including several nominations for "OutstandingComedy Series" in 2009. In 2011, CBS announced that the series hadbeen renewed for an additional two seasons, making the currentcount eight. The seventh season of the series premiered on September 19,2011 with back-to-back episodes.

 About this sitcom

The Simpsons is an American animated sitcom. The series is a satirical parody of a working class American lifestyle epitomized by its family of the same name, which consists of Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa and Maggie. The show is set in the fictional town of Springfield and parodies American culture, society, television and many aspects of the human condition.

Since its debut on December 17, 1989, the show has broadcast 489 episodes and the twenty-third season started airing on September 25, 2011. The Simpsons is the longest-running American sitcom, the longest-running American animated program, and in 2009 it surpassed Gun smoke as the longest-running American prime time, scripted television series.

The Simpsons has won dozens of awards since it debuted as a series, including 27 Prime time Emmy Awards. Time magazine's December 31, 1999 issue named it the 20th century's best television series. The Simpsons has influenced many adult-oriented animated sitcoms.

content:
Self-Introduction (20min)

Name、hometown、job、major、hobby、your current plan…

Grouping

Five-six person in each group   Find your partners

Background of this topic

A series of protests in Wall Street financial district which began on Sep17.2011, main protest concerns are social and economic inequality, corporate greed, corruption and influence over government. The use of slogan“we are the 99%”refers to the difference in wealth and income growth in the US between the wealthiest 1% and the rest of the population. It is believed that the obvious cause of protest is high level of widespread unemployment among the middle-class and young people.

QUESTION 1: (20min)

The global economy hasn’t yet recovered from the previous financial crisis and complicated issues are bothering different parts of the world. The increasing unemployment rate is a trigger of the OWS event and also an inevitable result of the present economy situation.

Who should take the responsibility to control the increasing unemployment? Give your answer and analysis with your own experience and story.

  • Government
  • corporate
  • individual

QUESTION2: (20min)

How to adapt with the increasing competitive job market? How to find an ideal job? Show your opinions and approaches.

  • Pursue higher education degree?
  • Abroad studies?
  • Obtain certain certificate and qualifications? (Such as Band4、6 , IELTS TOEFL, CPA, CFA etc.)

QUESTION3: (20min)

If you were in a dilemma whether to hold a relationship or pursue a career, and you could not have both, which one would you choose?

  • relationship
  • career or job

DEBATE CONTEST(45min) 角色扮演+辩论

RULE: Two group, 3p VS 3p, 3 round argue+1free debate+1state

GROUP A: 99% average, ROLE: a campus student, an employee, freelancer

GROUP B: 1% wealthiest, ROLE: a banker, an CEO, a lawyer
title: BJEC182: Occupy Wall Street & Employment

content:
Nowadays,there are lots of ancient cities in China undergoing the modernization period.How to deal with ancient things with tradition has become a controversial topic.

In March, 2011, the mayor of Nanjing issued an proclamation to cut/move most ofthe trees beside the main streets for the convenience of the subway under construction, which arose a fierce emotional resist among the citizens. For most of the trees had lived for more than half a century and been a part of many ones memories.

Another example about ancient architectures is just in Beijing, the city that we are all living in.

In1950s, after Beijing was chosen as the capital of PRC, there used to be a debate on whether the old city wall, since Ming Dynasty, should be kept. Some scholars,like Leung Sicheng, insisted that the city wall survived so many wars and changes with a collective memory of all the citizens and should be preserved. But the government made the decision that the wall might be an obstacle for the development of transportation and extension in the future. So the wall was removed finally.

Agenda

  1. To warm up, 5-6 people, including a leader should be summoned as a group. There would be 15 mins for a self-introduction.
  2. Share with group members about your most impressive experience and feelings about ancient sceneries. Afte20 mins discussion, one representative each group should present a summary.
  3. Do you think the ancient architectures and traditional sceneries should be preserved in modern cities? State your reasons. After 20 mins discussion, each group should send out one representative with pros and one with cons to make brief arguments.
  4. What would you do if you were the leader facing the conflicts between modernization and ancient sceneries? You could take Beijing City wall in 1950’ as an example. After 20 mins discussion, one representative each group should present a summary.

New words

  • demolish [vt] - demolition [n]  拆除
  • legacy [n] 遗产
  • places of interests 名胜
  • former residence 故居 e.g.:Laosheresidence
  • benefits[n] 利益， 益处
title: Protection of ancient architectures and traditional

content:
Our intimate relationships are the most important aspects of many people’s lives. Good, solid, fruitful and fulfilling loving bonding not only provide us with great joy and happiness, they also support our careers, inspire us towards the achievement of our deepest and most cherished goals, and provide a deeper sense of both physical and spiritual well-being. However so many of us don’t quite know or understand what goes into creating an ideal relationship. We may have had some wonderful relationships in the past, yet can’t quite pinpoint why they quickly disintegrated before our eyes. Sometimes we even do silly little things that sabotage and hurt our feelings with other people in irrevocable ways. We may discuss some questions around the loving relationship today.

To warm up, 5-6 people, including the leader, should be summoned as a group. There would be 15 mins for a self-introduction.

Question list

  • Would you forgive your spouse if they had an affair?
  • What if the affair was with your cousin/sister/beside?

content:
If you were not born with gold in mouth, I am sure you will need a job to live on yourself.

To talk things about work after working hour is really a “ Damn Bore”, but we still think this topic can help you to improve or give a test if you might be in a pure English interview in the future. Or at least you get started to say something about your work in English.

As everyone of us is expert of our own sector, but a layman from an others`. You may want to know something more about those working status, and have a think about yours. Such as: What does a businessman is really do every day? What is the detailed about his business? If all the ITers are programming every day? Or they may also response as businessmen? What does an accountant do? Why two people are called the same as Sales Director, but response quite differently, and have a big package gap?

Here we Rock:

Part 1 Group discussion (6-8 people):

Everyone of the group should introduce yourself to others, including:

Basic Information: name; current job (or last one); title; how you found this job; how long have been working; how do you think about this job, and why?

Detailed Information:

Describe to your group members detailed information about your sector and company; share a classic working day of yours, which started from the time arrived at office till left.

Public Speech:

Part 2 Group Discussion:

1. How you got the new job information?
2. How do you get work-life balance?
3. What kind of job you think is a perfect job?
4. How is your plan for coming 5 year`s career development?
5. What you think about self-promoted and happiness?
6. What do you think if a working connection becomes real life friends?
title: BJEC180 “Tell Me Something About Your Job”

content:
Hundreds of students pack Harvard's Sanders Theater for Michael Sandel's “Justice” courses—an introduction to moral and political philosophy. They come to hear Sandel lecture about great philosophers of the past—from Aristotle to John Stuart Mill—but also to debate contemporary issues that raise philosophical questions—about individual rights and the claims of community, equality and inequality, morality and law.

Despite the size of the course, Sandel engages students in lively discussion on topics including affirmative action, income distribution, and same-sex marriage, showing that even the most hotly contested issues of the day can be the subject of reasoned moral argument. This film, which contains excerpts of several classes, is part of a project to make this legendary course an educational resource that reaches beyond the Harvard classroom.

Now we take these hot debates in our English community, as Sandel told us: “The aim of this course is to awaken the restlessness of reason and to see where it might lead, and is to invite or provoke you to think.” We hope after this series of activities, you will have your own understanding about justice, liberty, and morality and be more wisdom in your life.

这是系列活动“Justice: what's the right thing to do？”的最后一期，这一系列的活动基于目前互联网上非常流行的哈佛公开课“公正”，两位英语角的资深主持人非常希望通过这种方式把我们的活动带入到一个更高的层次上，让大家去探讨一些更深刻的话题，让我们大家拭目以待吧。

关于“Justice: what's the right thing to do？”公开课的介绍：http://v.163.com/special/justice/

They seem have clearer understanding of their taste and personality. They are likely to define themselves with labels which can describe their characteristics fully and clearly.Then passion is the base to find like-minded people and they have certain taste that they like certain things. You can say they havespecial style. So, my question is,What you like? What interests you? Do you have your own style? Which labels do you want to paste in yourself? LolitaComplex ,Uncle Complex, tech geek, Foodie, Sport expert,Anime Fan ,shopaholic ,Moonlite, NEET…?And then , do you like labels that given by others and yourself? Do you satisfied with your current liftstyle? Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

content:
这世界上有两种人，他们个性不同，兴趣不同，心理需求也不同，相同的却是他们彼此吸引，彼此需要，因为不同产生的幸福，无法言喻，因为不同产生的矛盾，也叫人百思不得其解。

男人们说：我心中的Ta，要美丽，要贤惠，要上的厅堂,下得厨房，最重要的是Ta要永远崇拜我。
女人们说：我心中的Ta, 要高大，要英俊，要幽默风趣，事业有成，更重要的是Ta要永远照顾我。

男人们说： 我讨厌Ta 的公主病，讨厌Ta娇气不讲理，更讨厌Ta唠唠叨叨没完没了。
女人们说： 我讨厌Ta的少爷气，讨厌Ta不会洞察自己的心思，更讨厌Ta生气失落时总是单独沉默不理人。

This is a true story From ” Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus”
A week after our daughter Lauren was born, my wife Bonnie and I were completely exhausted. Each night Lauren kept waking us. Bonnie had been torn in the delivery and was taking pain killers. She could barely walk. After five days of staying home to help, I went back to work. She seemed to be getting better.
While I was away she ran out of pain pills. Instead of calling me at the office, she asked one of my brothers, who was visiting, to purchase more. My brother, however, did not return with the pills. Consequently, she spent the whole day in pain, taking care of a newborn.
I had no idea that her day had been so awful. When I returned home she was very upset. I misinterpreted the cause of her distress and thought she was blaming me.
She said, I’ve been in pain all day....I ran out of pills. I’ve been stranded in bed and nobody cares!
I said defensively, “Why didn’t you call me?”

content:
2013年充满了欢笑，也充满了泪水，让我们历尽酸甜苦辣百般滋味。 
这一年北京的雾霾问题尤其严重，雅安地震又一次震惊中国； 
这一年中国有了新的领导人，嫦娥三号发射升空。 
这一年铁娘子撒切尔夫人与世长辞，南非国父曼德拉也驾鹤西去； 
这一年蓝可儿事件让人惊悚，韩亚航空空难令人心酸； 
这一年凯特王妃生下了小王子，斯诺登还在四处藏身……
时间飞逝，一年又到尾声， 

这一年，你的人生是经历巨变，还是周而复始？ 
下一年，你要继续坚守，还是打破现状，另辟蹊径？ 
人生中总有个时刻，有件事，有个人让你刻骨铭心，难以忘怀。 
也许因为它，你改变了，成熟了，开朗了，安静了。 
这一期 我们来分享 "One day" ，在欣赏精彩片段的同时，感受两个主人公的生活经历与选择，回首2013年关于自己的大事记，展望生机勃勃的下一年。

Chirstmas is coming，快从忙碌的工作中逃脱出来吧，感受快乐的气氛，释放压抑的心情！后英语时代圣诞Party重磅出击~~~! 今天我们都是Super star！

这一夜，没有壁花小姐和宅男先生，体贴的流程设计和全场参与的互动环节，让每个人都快乐起来，与好朋友聊聊天，尽情参与不同的活动，大声喊出心中的理想，激情释放身体的快乐。

虽然我们大家周周都有沙龙，但在圣诞party上，不需要严谨的逻辑，深邃的哲理，精彩的英语演讲，大家就是随着音乐，好好享受轻松与快乐，好好释放一下青春，即使平时羞涩的伙伴，也能敞开心扉，展现自己精彩的另一面。

我们的后英语时代 圣诞狂欢Party：
准备了wii游戏，有趣的话题，美妙的音乐，不同的饮品还有轻松的环境。
活动主要分为以下几个部分：
美食畅饮：自助简餐为你省去没有时间吃晚餐的不便，让你吃饱肚子High翻天
全场互动喜剧：即兴表演，让大家high起来

content:
后英语时代，年前最后一次主题沙龙，Let's PET UP the world （与P.E.T.一起，用心点亮世界），真诚邀请你参加！

  • 春节就要到了，又是一个旅游的好时间，你准备出发去旅行了吗？ 
  • 还记得你上次去旅行中最值得向别人炫耀的事情和最值得向别人臭美的照片吗？ 
  • 你想要环游世界吗？英语对于你的意义是什么？ 你是否有过在国外旅游时不愉快的经历，如被误解或者被歧视？
  • 旅行的过程中，我们可以做什么，说什么能够赢得他人的尊重呢？
  • 如何安排我们自己的旅程，让自己的旅行不仅精彩而且更有意义呢？ 

本期活动，肌肉男Tyler与大块头Bug两位帅哥分享他们在世界各地旅行经历，从点点滴滴的小事到有欢乐有苦涩的故事，与大家共同探讨如何进行一次难忘旅行的方法。 他们旅行的过程中，追寻快乐的体验，美好的瞬间，忘却烦恼后的欢快，对未知世界的探索...但他们也追寻一份认同与一份尊重。所以他们要发起Let's PET UP the world（与PET一起，用心点亮世界）的活动，支持所有出去旅行的朋友们在世界的各个角落，不仅收获快乐与惊喜，同时也可以收获一份认同与尊重。

请记住，我们的口号是： Let's PET UP the world~！


活动时间：2014/1/18 下午 3点-5点 
活动地点：朝阳区建外SOHO 6号楼6301 HR人缘体验馆

content:
Hello my friends, it's my privilege to be the host this Wednesday. Ever since I entered middle school, I have found that people are never tired of gossiping their friends' constellations. For example, if you are a Pisces, you are supposed to be romantic and send flowers to your girlfriends. Taurus people are expected to be foodies, such as my younger brother. Therefore, I've decided to talk about constellations. ‍

  • Do you know what constellation you are?
  • Do you know what people are like if they share your constellation?
  • Do you believe your constellation tells people who you are?

If you are interested in the topic, come join our "gossip party" this Wednesday.

content: Since the invention and mass application of fait money, inflation becomes one of the inevitable problems that we have to face from time to time. Do you still remember how much a bowl of noddle cost 10 years ago? Different people may tackle inflation in various ways. Two typical options seem quite obvious. A. you can spend all you earn before the money value less. Or B. you can do a positive money management to deal with the inflation while try to increase the amount of your assets. Which way do you think will suit you best? Come and share with us your insights this Sunday.

content: In 1943, Professor Maslow presented his theory of a hierarchy of needs to explain human motivation. Now getting to know Maslow’s theory is a must for you to have a better understanding of others and yourself , to improve your relationship with other people, and to foster your personal growth and development. In this evening, we shall give an overview of Maslow’s theory and discuss news and stores around us to see how the theory works. This evening’s discussion may open a new window for you to understand and foresee all kinds of human behaviors besides the well-known star sign theory which you know already.

content:
When we are celebrating New Year holidays warmly and cozily with families, bad news arrives unexpectedly – nearly 40 people lost their lives in the gleaming Bund area in Shanghai when gathering to celebrate the 2015 New Year Countdown.Survivors described the stampede as "horrific and hellish."Some said they were standing on the steps adjoining the major road and the sightseeing platform when the deadly incident happened."The steps leading to the platform were full of people. Some wanted to get down and some wanted to go up. We were caught in the middle and saw some girls falling while screaming. Then people started to fall down, row by row."What do you think of the incident? Do you put safety ahead of all the others in your life? Anything do you want to share with us about your sense of safety? Welcome to join us in our new event venue on the coming Wednesday – Bookworm. With fancy drinks and elegant environment, we are here waiting for you.

当我们在家里与家人团聚，温暖地共享天伦，纵情地挥霍新年假期时，却未想到，噩耗在渐渐逼近 — 在上海外滩广场的新年倒数庆祝活动中，将近40人因踩踏而命丧黄泉。幸存者将此次踩踏事件形容为“及其可怕的如同地狱一般的经历”。有些人说当悲剧发生时，人群正在向临近主路的台阶上和观光平台上聚集。“通往观光台的台阶上站得满满都是人，有些想上去，有些想下来.。我们被困在中间，突然看到有些女孩跌掉了，并开始尖叫。然后一排排的人群倒下去...”您对此次悲剧事件有何看法？您始终将生命安全视作第一要务吗？就安全观而言，您有何与我们分享？欢迎本周三来参加我们的沙龙活动，我们换了新场地哦 — 老书虫，世界上最美的20间书店之一哦，P.E.T.的小伙伴们还等什么，让我们礼拜三见哟！

content:
“A thing is a thing, not what is said of that thing” --- Birdman

“Birdman” 是一部很耐人寻味，有点晦涩的电影。为什么这次获奖的会是“Birdman”呢？ 除了摄影，外籍导演，评委们喜欢的故事... 是不是还有一些真的可以触动人心东西呢？让我们一起分享，解析与探讨鸟人的 "The unexpected virtue of ignorance" 带给我们的启示吧。

活动最后会有一个经典重现环节，如果你想尝试表演，请背熟下面的台词哦。

LESLEY: Eddie! What are you doing here? Why? 

Eddie: I just want you to tell me why. 

Eddie: Shut up!

LESLEY: Eddie, please! 

Eddie: What's the matter with me? Tell me. Why do I always have to beg people to love me?

LESLEY: Eddie, please, give me the gun. It was me. I was drowning. I'm just not capable of...  You deserve to be loved, Eddie. You do.

Eddie: I just wanted to be what you wanted. What you wanted. Now I spend every fucking minute trying to be something else, something I'm not. 

MIKE: Just put the gun down, Ed. She doesn't love you anymore. 

Eddie: You don't, do you? 

LESLEY: No. 

Eddie: And you never will. 

LESLEY: I'm sorry.

Eddie: I don't exist. I'm not even here. I'm not even here. Bang!
title: "The unexpected virtue of ignorance" 带给我们的启示

content:
二十多岁，是被我们时常挂在嘴边的青春，也是时常口口声声喊“再不疯狂就老了”的年华，更是常被肆意挥霍的岁月。可你可能不知道，你二十岁开始的这个十年不能随意虚度，这个十年是人成长定性的重要时段，如果弱冠之年还没开你甚远，那么恭喜你，因为你现在就能看到许多活到三四十岁的人口中时常感慨的希望早年便能得到的人生智慧。 

Someone told me once: Thirty’s the new Twenty. I was thinking it was right for a long time. But when it stars to sound like this:” my 20s are almost over, and I have nothing to show for myself. I had a better résumé the day after I graduated from college. 
So, which saying is correct? Or either of them is not correct? Let’s check it out by the P.E.T Workshop this Thursday evening.

小伙伴们，P.E.T 2015年的活动正式开始了，感谢亲们全年的支持，周三我们会和大家一起探讨2015年我们如何实现自己心中的愿望。

“P.E.T 2015 心愿完成计划” 由我们美丽，可爱，负责任的组织者Michelle发起，她觉得2014年我们P.E.T真的很欢乐，娱乐有余，但功效不足。为什么不能让我们的社交活动除了好玩与放松，也可以解决一些实际问题呢？所以Michelle就在大年三十的前一天提出了她的 “P.E.T New Year Resolution Plan”，目前已经收集了近100位朋友的新年愿望，并起草了一个方案，来支持大家新年愿望的实现。

这次活动由我们的王牌主持：Michelle & Justin与大家一起探讨 P.E.T作为一个社交圈，一个朋友圈，如何充分利用Peer Pressure的力量，来支持我们实现今年的愿望，让我们自己的生活变的更美好一点。

content:

content: “剑道”一词源于中国的春秋战国时期，但是还是必须承认，今日所谓的“剑道”这项武术运动与中国的关系并不大了。现在的剑道多指在日本非常流行的一种传统运动项目。剑道有三个特点，1：具有一定的对抗性，但很安全；2：需要认真学习和连续才能掌握；3：剑道具有一定的哲学内涵，它讲究气、剑、体一致，以静制动、不变应万变、后发制人、弱胜强柔克刚等等。如今剑道以其独特的魅力也成为都市人的一种时尚运动项目。这次我们P.E.T的小伙伴们一起去体验一下吧。本次活动会由专业剑道老师指导，场地只容纳15人。

In this talk, I’ll share with you my recent trip back to Sydney, where I spent five years studying and working before. Sydney is a charming city and surely you’ll be able to see some of its world-famous landmarks during this talk. Local food and events will also be some of the highlights tonight. In addition, I’ll provide some travel tips in case you ever plan to visit this city. Ever wondered about what the people and lifestyle are like in Australia? Then don’t miss this talk! 

众所周知，澳大利亚是旅行节目的常客，它优美的环境，绚丽的风景都给我们留下了深刻的印象，而悉尼歌剧院、黄金海岸、大堡礁也都是我们耳熟能详的名字。你一定对这个国家很好奇吧？有没有想过生活在这个国家是什么样子？那千万不要错过今晚的分享！

Discover what wine varietals are being produced in your favorite wine nations of the world. From old world wine countries like France and Italy to new world Napa wines and Argentinian Malbecs, you can check out the homes and histories of your favorite wines.You will gain many kinds of information about wine, and don’t need to taste the red wine from all of world. Just Join us this Thursday. There will be a lot of surprises waiting for you.

本期活动因场地需要提前准备红酒，请提前报名付费，提前报名费用50元，空降80元（费用包含场地费，酒水）。

关于讲师：

Nicolas Carre is a wine certified specialist graduated from the "wine university" in France, recognized today as one of the top wine education in the world.

When arrived in China, Nicolas started to work as News Caster for CCTV international. Then, as the wine market grown incredibly, he decided to move back to his passion: “wine”. Since then, Nicolas has been the restaurant manager & sommelier of “Maxim’s de Paris” (Pierre Cardin), director & head educator at CAFA Beijing, a branch of Bordeaux famous wine & spirits School.

Today, as a Independent wine expert, Nicolas is involved in many wine events, trainings, competitions… He writes for magazines & blogs and advises companies for their wines selection and education in China (Wine Capital, Vinolia, Junding Club, Changyu…)

content:
With elegant color, pleasant aroma, and full of the taste of exploring and challenging, wine always let people praise it much. A multitude of wine in the world, their aroma is very strong, or with pineapple, mango and other tropical fruit flavours, or show pepper and other spices, or exudes the fragrance of roses. You can find them in France, the United States, Austria, Italy, New Zealand and other major countries in the world of wine country. This Thursday, let's discover  Grapes & Wine Aromas  from the world . There will be a lot of surprises waiting for you.

葡萄酒常以其优雅的色泽、怡人的芳香，以及充满探索和挑战的口感，而一直让人们赞叹不已。在世界各地的众多葡萄酒中，有那么一些葡萄酒，它们的香气极为浓郁奔放，或带有菠萝、芒果等热带水果味，或展现出胡椒及其他香料味，或散发着玫瑰、金银花等芬芳的花香味。在法国、美国、奥地利、意大利、新西兰等世界各大产酒国，你都能寻找到它们的足迹。

本周法国专业侍酒师培训师 将带领大家进行新一期的葡萄酒之旅，本周来聊聊来自于 葡萄和葡萄酒的芳香。

All nationalities are welcome, the majority of the discussion will be in English.

欢迎来自各个国家的朋友参与，讨论语言为英语。

本期活动因场地需要提前准备红酒，请提前报名付费，提前报名费用50元，空降80元（费用包含场地费，酒水）。

content:
The word perfume derives from the Latin perfumare, meaning "to smoke through." Perfumery, or the art of making perfumes, began in ancient Mesopotamia and Egypt, and was further refined by the Romans and Persians.

香水一词来自于 拉丁语perfumare，意思是：洞穿。

香水制造 或者 香水制造艺术 ，起源于Mesopotamia 和 Egypt， 后来由罗马人和波斯人将它细化。

Nowadays， many young people like wearing perfume or cologne.

How many brands of them do you know ?

Do you know how to correctly wear perfume or cologne?

Like this?

Or this?

ARE YOU AWARE which perfume or cologne should be wore in certain occasion , or how to pick perfume or cologne according one’s personalities?

Do you think of wearing perfume or cologne could improve your image or destroy it?

Let’s discover the fragrance this Thursday, please bring your favorite perfume or cologne to our venue, we have a fantastic game waiting for you.

当下生活中，年轻人们都喜欢使用香水 , 你都知道什么香水品牌呢？

你知道怎么来正确的使用香水吗？

或者你清楚什么场合使用什么香水更恰当，你的性格适合什么香水？

你想过吗？ 使用香水可以提升你的形象，当然也可以毁了形象。

本周四，让我们一起探索芬芳的世界吧，请各位带一瓶自己钟爱的香水，有个超棒的游戏等你一起来玩哦。

content:
Here's a happy topic to talk about – happiness! Start your English conversation with the basic questions below. You can ask follow-up questions if they fit your partner's answer. If you don't have a conversation partner, think about how you would answer each question with complete English sentences. 
1. Generally speaking, are you a happy person? 
2. What things or events make you happiest? 
3. Who is the happiest person you know? Do you know why they're so happy? 
4. Were you happier as a child than as an adult? Why or why not? 
5. Do you think we can control our own happiness?

content:
Thirty years after women became 50 percent of the college graduates in the United States, men still hold the vast majority of leadership positions in government and industry. This means that women’s voices are still not heard equally in the decisions that most affect our lives. In Lean In, Sheryl Sandberg examines why women’s progress in achieving leadership roles has stalled, explains the root causes, and offers compelling, common sense solutions that can empower women to achieve their full potential.

《向前一步》连续6周位居《纽约时报》非虚构类畅销书排行榜第一！作为全球最成功的女性之一，谢丽尔桑德伯格在《向前一步》中深刻地剖析了男女不平等现象的根本原因，解开了女性成功的密码！她认为，女性之所以没有勇气跻身领导层，不敢放开脚步追求自己的梦想，更多是出于内在的恐惧与不自信。她在书中鼓励所有女性，要大胆地“往桌前坐”，主动参与对话与讨论，说出自己的想法。同时，她还为女性提出了如下成功密码，激励女性勇于接受挑战，满怀热情地追求自己的人生目标。

This Thursday, let’s share the wisdom and experience from this book. Every girl can’t miss it.

这个星期四， 让我们一同分享来自这本书的生活智慧，每个女生都不该错过。

content:
味道与记忆及情绪有着千丝万缕的联系，这联系不单单只是感觉而已，还有科学依据在里头。面对生活压力不断加大的今天，我们往往运用理性解决问题，其实还有感性可以用。运用味道对情绪的影响就是其中一个很不错的方法。本期话题介绍精油的一些知识以及日常应用，让我们更加平和面对生活的挑战。

There are very complicated connections between taste,memory,and emotion. These connections are not just feeling, they are also have butch of scientific proof. We tend to use rational ways to solve daily problem under increasing life stress nowadays. However, there are also many emotional ways to easy our life. Such as using the taste to influence our bad mood.… This topic will cover some knowledge of essential oil for daily application, which will make us more calm in the face of life's challenges.
title: Aromatherapy for everyone!

content:
• Why are cities organized the way they are?
  • Why do people live in cities?
  • What will cities look like in the future?
  • Have you ever thought which city you love for living would be like?
  • Is the First-Tier city the best place for young people living?


This Thursday Quentin's presentation will look at the urban planning and design of Chinese cities from an historical perspective. He'll explore how both Chinese and western ideas came to shape the Chinese city of today and how modern concepts of architecture and urbanism, which began during the industrial revolution, influenced contemporary cities worldwide.

为什么城市如此运作？为什么人们要生活在城市中？未来的城市将会是怎样？... 大连万达集团首席设计师孟昆廷先生，本周四将会与我们分享从历史的角度来观察现在中国城市的规划与设计。他会带我们探索中西方文化在城市建设方面的差异，探讨现代城市的设计理念等问题。

All nationalities are welcome, the majority of the discussion will be in English. 

欢迎来自各个国家的朋友参与，讨论语言为英语。 

This event is open to everyone but it is especially designed for people like to socialize and gain the culture from the world.

本活动向所有人开放，主要针对喜欢社交和世界文化交流的人群。

About Host: Quentin Montrie AIA： 

An American architect and urban designer with over 25 years of professional experience, Quentin joined the Dalian Wanda Group's hospitality design team in January, 2014 and is involved in their overseas hotel / mixed use developments. He has been working as an architect on large commercial mixed use projects in Asia for over 8 years, first as a Senior Architect in Hong Kong for HOK and then in Shanghai as Studio Director for Woods Bagot. A LEED accredited professional since 2002, he has been involved in sustainable design initiatives including LEED certified projects in the US and Asia.

Prior to moving to Asia in 2006, he lived in San Francisco, CA and worked for Skidmore, Owings & Merrill and HOK, involved in such projects as the St. Regis Museum Tower and the SF Transbay Terminal master plan among others.

Originally from Washington DC, Quentin attended architecture schools at University of Maryland and Virginia Tech. He is a US registered architect in the District of Columbia, a member of the American Institute of Architects and the Urban Land Institute.

小伙伴们，多久你已经没有随着音乐翩翩起舞了？还是你会因为不会跳舞而对自己的舞步非常没有自信呢? ...请不要再犹豫了，快来感受一下风情拉丁舞的独特魅力吧。这种舞蹈舞步简单，节奏欢快，是释放压力，缓解疲劳，运动健身与交朋友的好方法哦。而且你不需要任何舞蹈功底，只要愿意随着音乐舞动起来~！现在，快来释放我们体内的舞蹈精灵吧~

这次活动我们邀请了资深的风情拉丁舞培训师杨老师做我们的舞蹈教练。杨老师已有超过10年的教学经验，创立了一套系统的教学体系，以其速成、实用、有趣、观赏性强的特点。

课程内容大致分为热身舞步，基本舞步，音乐节拍与基本套路等，包括简单易学的merengue，与salsa舞。

注意事项：

可以穿休闲鞋，但推荐穿矮跟舞鞋。

活动费用支付给优肯舞蹈俱乐部。

活动咨询：15810263968(微信号) alex 

活动费用：30元，请添加微信号：cutepet2015，【可爱的PET】报名并支付费用。
